meanings.definition: A style of typeface without serifs.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using sanserif fonts for my presentations.
meanings.sent2: The designer chose a sanserif typeface for the logo.
meanings.sent3: The sanserif font on the poster made the text look modern and sleek.
meanings.sent4: In the world of typography, sanserif is like the minimalist's choice.
meanings.sent5: The absence of serifs in sanserif fonts gives them a clean and contemporary look.

meanings.sent1: The sanserif text on the website was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She used a sanserif style for the headings in her report.
meanings.sent3: The sanserif print on the menu made the restaurant seem more casual.
meanings.sent4: His writing style was sanserif, reflecting his straightforward personality.
meanings.sent5: The sanserif design of the book cover gave it a modern and uncluttered appearance.
